meta.description: Routing algorithms native to the Hyperbolic Manifold

hyperbolic_greedy_forwarding.logic: Select neighbor n_i that minimizes dist_H(n_i, destination).

local_minima_handling.description: If no neighbor is closer, backtrack along the incoming geodesic and try the next best angular sector.

geodesic_multipath.mechanism: Emit k packets with initial tangent vectors separated by angle theta. Packets follow geodesics until TTL or destination.
